channel.title: Instant hits? Instant Specs?
channel.description:
Ok, well I'm using delta's base and I've noticed some people have managed to fix this but I can't seem to figure it out, everytime I click to attack or special attack anything there is a very annoying 1 to 2 second delay before anything happens, does anyone know how I can fix this? All help is apprciated...
Thanks,Moose

item.title: Instant hits? Instant Specs?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“erowid, post:2, topic:286945”]if u figured this out plz help me with it to [/quote]This topic is from the start of the year, don’t bump it up.

It’s probably just a delay, look into the special attack area and remove the delays

Read full topic
